articles.title: Google has bigger problems than iMessage making Android users switch to iPhone - BGR
articles.description: A new CIRP survey shows that iMessage is hardly the main reason Android users leave Google for Apple's iPhone - here's why they switch.
articles.content: More people switch from Android to iPhone than the other way around, and that’s how it has always been. Apple’s iMessage has been seen as a key product that can convince consumers to move from an And… [+3501 chars]
